Privacy Policy

Effective Date: May 13, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how Trion Holdings, LLC ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses information when you visit our website.

1. Information We Collect

Our website is a static site and does not directly collect personal information from visitors such as names, email addresses, or contact details through forms or user accounts.

However, we do use a third-party service, Google Analytics, which collects non-personally identifiable information about your visit.

2. Google Analytics

We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our website. Google Analytics collects information such as your IP address (anonymized), browser type, operating system, referring website, pages viewed, and time spent on each page.

3. Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device by your web browser. Google Analytics uses cookies to track your activity on our website.

4. Data Security

Since we do not directly collect or store personal information on this static website, the risks associated with a data breach of personal information are significantly minimized.

5. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: info@trionholdings.com

Contact:
